file_insights.changes_summary: Added retention policy helpers, compression metadata interfaces, and metadata schemas for page versions and drive backups

patterns_discovered: Documenting metadata schemas with comprehensive comments
Providing default retention policy with configurable parameters
Using JSONB for flexible metadata storage
Implementing helper functions for common calculations
gotchas_discovered: Handling dynamic metadata fields with type safety
Providing sensible defaults for retention periods
recommendations: Consider adding unit tests for calculateVersionExpiresAt function
Implement validation logic for retention periods
Create documentation explaining the metadata and retention strategy
